repliclust.utils¶

This module provides utility functions for repliclust.

Functions

assemble_covariance_matrix(axes, axis_lengths)

Assemble axes and axis lengths into a covariance matrix or inverse covariance matrix.

log_volume(radius, dim)

Compute log volume for a sphere of a given radius in the given dimension.

make_orthonormal_axes(n, dim)

Sample n_axes orthonormal axes in n_dim dimensions.

radius_from_log_volume(log_volume, dim)

Compute radius corresponding to a sphere of given log volume in the given number of dimensions.

sample_unit_vectors(n, dim)

Sample n unit vectors in dim dimensions.
